Decent game. Hard to get into if you are a new player. There's a steep learning curve, and even if you do learn how to play, it requires practice to be able to react quickly, aim precisely and accurately, and to know what to do. Also, you occasionally get put into matchmaking with people who don't speak English (or whatever language is dominant in your region) and they refuse to cooperate even if they do speak English.
